claim.text: The proposed JMRI framework achieves state-of-the-art performance on five benchmark datasets.
claim.exact_quote: Experimental results on five benchmark datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed method against the state-of-the-arts.

evidence.evidence_text: Top-1 accuracy on ReferItGame (JMRI II: 71.65%), Flickr30K Entities (JMRI I: 81.23%, JMRI II: 82.11%), RefCOCO (JMRI II: 85.95% on val, 86.47% on testA), RefCOCO+ (JMRI II: 87.05% on val, 86.21% on testA), and RefCOCOg (JMRI II: 84.28% on val-g, 83.36% on test-u).
evidence.limitations: Dataset-specific performance might not generalize to other visual grounding tasks.
evidence.exact_quote: See Tables III and IV for detailed results.

evaluation.justification: The evidence strongly supports the claim, showcasing the framework's effectiveness across multiple datasets.

claim.text: The early joint representation module in JMRI effectively captures semantic correspondences between vision and language.
claim.exact_quote: The resulting joint representations serve as inputs for later fusion, enabling the model to locate the referred object more accurately.

evidence.evidence_text: Grad-CAM visualization highlights image regions considered important for the target object, even if not precisely localized (Fig. 3).
evidence.limitations: Limited to qualitative analysis; quantitative evaluation is not provided.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim, but its qualitative nature leaves room for more comprehensive evaluation.

claim.text: The proposed JMRI framework can perform zero-shot grounding on certain new visual concepts in the open world.
claim.exact_quote: The results show that the proposed model can perform zero-shot grounding on certain new visual concepts in the open world, such as Sun Wukong, white dragon, mountain wall, and even abstract words.

evidence.evidence_text: Visualization of zero-shot prediction (Fig. 5) demonstrates the model's ability to generalize to unseen concepts.
evidence.limitations: Limited to a few examples; lacks comprehensive evaluation.
evidence.exact_quote: See Fig. 5 for zero-shot prediction examples.

evaluation.justification: The evidence is intriguing but lacks the breadth and depth to conclusively support the claim.
